Uses of Class
cipheringPackage.Key

  • Packages that use Key 
    Package Description
    cipheringPackage  
    fileHandlingPackage  

    • Uses of Key in cipheringPackage

      Subclasses of Key in cipheringPackage 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Cipher
      This is Cipher Class that extends the Key Class It is the parent of both Encryption and Decryption Classes It contains the shared attributes (fields) among Encryption and Decryption Classes with getter and setter methods to manipulate them
      class  Decryption
      This is Decryption Class that extends the Cipher Class it performs all the decryption work and stores the plain-text(which is the final-wanted result in decryption)in the private field "plainText"
      class  Encryption
      This is Encryption Class that extends the Cipher Class it performs all the encryption work and stores the cipher-text(which is the final-wanted result)in the Cipher class private field "cipherText"

    • Uses of Key in fileHandlingPackage

      Methods in fileHandlingPackage that return Key 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Key FileHandling.openKey(Language language)
      This method opens a key file chosen by the user in a directory if the file doesn't exist in the the chosen directory it returns null this method catch all possible at-run-time errors that may happen and informs the user about it
      Methods in fileHandlingPackage with parameters of type Key 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void FileHandling.saveKey(Language language, Key key)
      This method create SaveDialog to save the given key object of type Key in a key File as an object it's declared static because it doesn't rely on any instance of this class so it can be accessed directly by invoking it directly from this class
